name: Modal
description: This component is a Modal content of which you can add by dragging the components into this component.

properties.name: modalVisibility
properties.label: Modal Visibility
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to control the visibility of the modal.
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to control the visibility of the modal.

properties.name: closeOnEscape
properties.label: Close On Escape
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to add the close of the modal window by pressing Escape or Backdrop.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to add the close of the modal window by pressing Escape or Backdrop.

properties.name: allowScrolling
properties.label: Allow Scrolling
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to control the page scroll ability when a modal is open.
properties.settingTooltip: By selecting this checkbox, you will be able to scroll through the page that is under the backdrop.

properties.name: contentWidth
properties.label: Content Width
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the width of the modal content.
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to specify max width of the modal content. Scrolling will occur if you pass any component whose width exceeds the Content Width.

properties.name: contentHeight
properties.label: Content Height
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the height of the modal content.
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to specify max height of the modal content. Scrolling will occur if you pass any component whose width exceeds the Content Height.

eventHandlers.name: onClose
eventHandlers.label: On Close Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered when the user clicks on the backdrop or Escape button.
